staxel.village.dialogue.SurrogateShopKee: I tried running this store with an honesty box one time...
I don't own this store, I'm just watching it for a friend.
In fact I don't think I've seen her in a very long time.
I've been thinking of taking a vacation...
But then who would watch the store?
A few times in the past, petals have gone missing from the cash register.
I had to hike up the prices for a few days to compensate...
Somehow the money found its way back though!
I guess they must have felt pretty guilty about it.
This place hasn't always been as well stocked as it is today.
Back when I started minding the place, it only stocked basic groceries!
I've done what I could to keep the store alive.
